Ok, that's enough, Kinger and JP. You two can yell at each other all 
you want over IM, but next time you copy-paste a conversation like 
that, I'm gonna start setting people on moderated. I don't wanna see 
arguments like that break out over the board, capishe?

Excellent. Now work it out between yourselves and please don't ask me 
to interfere. Random IM putdowns DO NOT need to be and WILL NOT be 
posted on the board. Next time I see something like that, I'm 
clicking the "Moderate" button.


GTG right now, but I'll be back to post later.
